reviews.review_msg: Dorothy helped me discover a passion for art history which I would have never expected. As long as you pay attention and take good notes you should do fine in her class.

One of the most hardworking profs I have had. Lectures are long, heavy, and fast-paced. You must be able to write fast in order to have decent notes. The group project is (in my opinion) the worst part and time consuming. Other than that, I highly recommend voice recording if you cannot keep up with writing notes. Study hard for this class to pass.

Her lectures were always interesting and inspiring, I was never bored. She outlined what she expected very clearly, and her exams and marking scheme were fair. I would definitely take her course again if I could! She is one of the best teachers I have had at SFU.
